translations: 可在图上标示的；可用图表示的

sentences.sentence: With this wizard, you can see all of the mappable objects.
sentences.translation: 使用这个向导，您就可以看到所有的可映射对象。

sentences.sentence: If mappable, the Windows construct can be mapped to the specified Linux construct (s) by closely examining the types, parameters, return codes, and such.
sentences.translation: 如果可映射，则Windows结构可以映射到特定的Linux结构(需要仔细检查类型、参数、返回代码等)。

sentences.sentence: The classification column (which explains classification constructs used in this article) indicates whether the Windows construct is mappable or context specific.
sentences.translation: “类别”一列(解释了本文中所使用的分类结构)表明了Windows结构是否可映射或者与上下文相关。
